00018 // helper template for circle shapes
00019 
00020 template<class Object = i2d::CCircle, class Shape = iview::CCircleShape>
00021 struct TCircleVisualObject
00022 {
00023        TCircleVisualObject(bool editable = false);
00024 
00025        typedef imod::TModelWrap<Object> PositionModel;
00026 
00027        istd::TDelPtr<PositionModel> model;
00028        istd::TDelPtr<Shape> shape;
00029 };
00030 
00031 
00032 template<class Object, class Shape>
00033 TCircleVisualObject<Object, Shape>::TCircleVisualObject(bool editable)
00034 {
00035        model.SetPtr(new PositionModel);
00036 
00037        shape.SetPtr(new Shape);
00038        shape->SetEditablePosition(editable);
00039        shape->SetEditableRadius(editable);
00040 
00041        model->AttachObserver(shape.GetPtr());
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 // helper template for image shapes
00046 
00047 template<class Object, class BitmapShape = iview::CImageShape>
00048 struct TBitmapVisualObject
00049 {
00050        TBitmapVisualObject(const Object* imagePtr = NULL);
00051 
00052        typedef imod::TModelWrap<Object> ImageModel;
00053 
00054        istd::TDelPtr<ImageModel> model;
00055        istd::TDelPtr<BitmapShape> shape;
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00059 template<class Object, class BitmapShape>
00060 TBitmapVisualObject<Object, BitmapShape>::TBitmapVisualObject(const Object* imagePtr)
00061 {
00062        model.SetPtr(new ImageModel);
00063        if (imagePtr != NULL){
00064               model->SetBaseObject(*imagePtr);
00065        }
00066        
00067        shape.SetPtr(new BitmapShape);
00068 
00069        model->AttachObserver(shape.GetPtr());
00070 }
